      • configureTaskExecutor

        protected void configureTaskExecutor(com.google.inject.PrivateBinder binder)
        Description copied from class: DataLayerConnectionModule
        Configures the task executor and associated classes. If the data layer is only being used for its connection factory, this may not need to do anything.

        At the minimum, this must bind instances of:

        • TaskExecutor
        • TokenStorageAdapter

        If the task executor is a SeriesTaskExecutor, a QueueConfiguration will also need to be bound.

        Overrides:
        configureTaskExecutor in class DataLayerConnectionModule
        Parameters:
        binder - The module's binder.
